Reviews.Title: Canon PowerShot A2200 Kit Bundle 4GB/SD and case
Reviews.Author: 3lckr
Reviews.Content: A steal for this price! Great camera and features, expected nothing less from Canon. SD card of unknown brand, but so far no problems. Battery lasts forever (almost). Built case is not much, beside being king of big for this particular camera. Overall, great purchase.

Reviews.Title: love this camera
Reviews.Author: mommyrat
Reviews.Content: this is a great camera dose fantastic on close ups and that was some thing I needed in a camera would tell my friends to get one too if the ever needed a good camera 10 from me

Reviews.Title: Grandmama's new camera
Reviews.Author: Colleen S. Morgan
Reviews.Content: This tiny light weight camera is easy to use, light to carry and takes very clear pictures.  Would recommend this product to any of my friends and family.  Having the memory card and case included in the package made it very cost effective also.

Reviews.Title: best for your money
Reviews.Author: Peggy G.
Reviews.Content: better than the nikkon coolpix camera. has lasted more than 3 years no issue. love the rechargeable battery and the fact that the lens cover hasn't stuck closed

Reviews.Title: everything was included just as I wanted
Reviews.Author: karen mcnickle
Reviews.Content: I did not need to go to the store to get a card or anything just opened it up and start taking pictures.  I have already used for a mini vacation.

Reviews.Title: Defective on arrival
Reviews.Author: RS
Reviews.Content: Camera looked great when it arrived. Followed the instructions per manual and inserted the battery in the camera after it charged. Screen was white and the camera deemed defective! What a joke!

Reviews.Title: canon camera
Reviews.Author: mister G
Reviews.Content: For basic camera this is well worth the $90.00 it cost, simple to use, very good quality of picture. I would and have recommened to my friends. good choice, low cost, easy to use.

DIGIC 4 Image Processor; Discreet Mode disables sound, flash and AF beam.Smart Auto (32 scenes); Creative Filters.USB 2.0 Hi-Speed; SD card slot.

ProductInfo.Name: Canon PowerShot A2200 14.1MP Digital Camera Deluxe Kit Bundle Red 4GB Memory Card & Built Case Included
